name: Flip (itch) (Jacob, Procyon B, CandyDandyMan)
description:
Controls : WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Jump : Space

Restart : R

Flip is a fast-paced platformer where you can flip through the floor! Unfortunately there are a couple of bugs, if you get stuck press R to restart. Any and all feedback is greatly appreciated! Can you find the easter egg?

Made in 5 days for Curdle Game Jam #19. Thanks so much to Curdle for organizing this jam, it's been a ton of fun to participate in!

Code : CandyDandyMan

Art : Jacob

Audio : Procyon B
